entry.title: Friday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
